abstrac: Transform the visions in your mind to words that dance on the page.
bio:
A gifted muse of words, I wear many hats, including creative writer, published author, screenwriter, proofreader, ghostwriter, and collaborator.

My publishing credits include The Samsara Chronicles, Books 1 & 2, Kiyama, Scirotica 1, 2, 3, Sandcastles, a short story in the sci-fi anthology, Voices of Imagination, and a young adult science fiction novella, Sanctuary. Many of my short stories have also appeared on various websites. I collaborated on the script for "A Timeless Journey”, an informational documentary for the Naval Research Laboratory in the United States. 

I have also completed over 1100 jobs as a freelance writer from bios to books for clients around the world. Many of these projects included improving the English of non-native speakers. I've lived in the UK, US, and Canada and am cognizant of language differences.

Many of my freelance jobs have involved both fiction and non-fiction books. Recent projects include a three-year reincarnation-based novel collaboration, a controversial-themed novel, mentoring a disabled client through two book projects, and editing a client's fantasy/romance series. Past projects have included fiction and non-fiction books, and autobiographical novels for an abuse survivor, a stalking survivor, a woman who underwent weight-loss surgery, and others.    A gifted muse of words, I wear many hats, including creative writer, published author, screenwriter, proofreader, ghostwriter, and collaborator.

My publishing credits include The Samsara Chronicles, Books 1 & 2, Kiyama, Scirotica 1, 2, 3, Sandcastles, a short story in the sci-fi anthology, Voices of Imagination, and a young adult science fiction novella, Sanctuary. Many of my short stories have also appeared on various websites. I collaborated on the script for "A Timeless Journey”, an informational documentary for the Naval Research Laboratory in the United States.
I'm fast, flexible, and easy to reach via email or phone. I enjoy collaboration and discussion.

bio:
I am Abhisekh Das. I am working with AutoCAD & Revit Architecture for more than 13yrs. I also worked on AutoCAD 2D drawing & 3D Modelling and 4D. I also worked on BIM (Building Information Modelling) projects like Residential, Commercial, Educational, Hospital, etc. I am a Civil Engineer with more than 10yrs working experience in this field. I am also experienced in working with Point Cloud using AutoCAD & Revit both using Autodesk Recap. I prepare 2D & 3D both in Point Cloud Work. I am also experienced in working on ADA (USA) and NHSPS (UK) work.

As I am very much passionate about this type of work, I always try to deliver a satisfying output to my clients as per their expectations. I hope after reviewing my profile my output quality will not disappoint you. Please feel free to contact me if you have any projects related to my skills.

It's important to me to build good relationships with clients, so I'm primarily looking for projects. I'm flexible with my working hours and am happy to work closely with any existing freelancers you work with. I look forward to hearing from you!

Work 7 days a week and always available in chat or mail, whenever you need to discuss the project.
Provide technical support even after the project is completed.
100% client satisfaction assured.
Able to work on a tight schedule.
